trans-unit.source: Dynamically performs hit testing on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa dinamicamente o teste de clique em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> dynamically determines whether the user "hits" a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> dinamicamente determina se o usuário "atinge" um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: This class enables you to provide immediate feedback to the user in situations such as selecting and erasing ink.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe permite que você fornecer comentários imediatos para o usuário em situações como selecionar e apagar tinta.

trans-unit.source: There are two classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>:
trans-unit.target: Há duas classes que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> faz testes traços, determinando se um caminho de Laço ao seu redor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining where an eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> faz testes traços, determinando onde um caminho de borracha faz interseção com ele.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn how to manage digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista onde aprender como gerenciar tinta digital em um controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: To do this…
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso...

trans-unit.source: See this article
trans-unit.target: Consulte este artigo

trans-unit.source: Create a control that collects digital ink
trans-unit.target: Criar um controle que coleta tinta digital

trans-unit.source: [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Criando um controle de entrada de tinta](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)

trans-unit.source: Create a control that enables the user to select ink
trans-unit.target: Criar um controle que permite que o usuário selecione tinta

trans-unit.source: [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como selecionar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)

trans-unit.source: Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink
trans-unit.target: Criar um controle que permite que o usuário tinta de apagamento de ponto

trans-unit.source: [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> when the user inputs data with the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar pontos a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> quando o usuário insere dados com a caneta.

trans-unit.source: The example includes a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event handler that erases the part of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that the user intersects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> manipulador de eventos que apaga a parte do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> que faz interseção com o usuário.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> when the user inputs data with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar pontos a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> quando o usuário insere dados com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: The example includes a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event handler that erases the part of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that the user intersects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> manipulador de eventos que apaga a parte do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> que faz interseção com o usuário.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona pontos ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> a ser adicionada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona pontos ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> when the user inputs data with the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar pontos a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> quando o usuário insere dados com a caneta.

trans-unit.source: The example includes a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event handler that erases the part of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that the user intersects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> manipulador de eventos que apaga a parte do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> que faz interseção com o usuário.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> a serem adicionados ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> especificados ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> when the user inputs data with the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar pontos a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> quando o usuário insere dados com a caneta.

trans-unit.source: The example includes a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event handler that erases the part of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that the user intersects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> manipulador de eventos que apaga a parte do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> que faz interseção com o usuário.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The points to add
trans-unit.target: Os pontos a adicionar

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona pontos ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" />.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> method when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> finishes hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> método quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> conclusão do teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> after using an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como chamar <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> depois de usar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> called `eraseTester`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> chamado `eraseTester`.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" /> is hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" /> está realizando teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" /> is hit testing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester" /> é atingido teste; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.IsValid%2A> returns `true` until <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.IsValid%2A> retorna `true` até <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Then it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> is valid before adding points to it.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> é válido antes de adicionar pontos a ele.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> called `eraseTester`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> chamado `eraseTester`.
